<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Disarming Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=1896) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 159 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Bastion](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=49)

**Prerequisites**
[Bastion Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1895); Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

**Trigger**
You [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839) a melee Strike made with a held weapon.

</column>

---

You attempt to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) the creature whose attack you blocked of the weapon they attacked you with. You can do so even if you don't have a hand free.
name: Disarming Block
